00026 struct vmedrv_config_t {
00027     char* mode_name;
00028     unsigned address_modifier;
00029     unsigned dma_address_modifier;
00030     unsigned data_width;
00031     unsigned function_code;
00032     unsigned byte_swapping;
00033 };
00034 
00035 static const struct vmedrv_config_t vmedrv_config_table[] = {
00036 /*  Name      AM code     DMA AM    Data Width  Function Code   BYTE SWAP */
00037 { "A16D16",  amA16,      amINVALID,   dwWORD,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00038 { "A16D32",  amA16,      amINVALID,   dwLONG,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00039 { "A24D16",  amA24DATA,  amA24BLOCK,  dwWORD,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00040 { "A24D32",  amA24DATA,  amA24BLOCK,  dwLONG,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00041 { "A32D16",  amA32DATA,  amA32BLOCK,  dwWORD,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00042 { "A32D32",  amA32DATA,  amA32BLOCK,  dwLONG,  fcREMOTE_BUS_IO,   bsNONE  },
00043 /* The order of entries in this table must be exactly same with        */
00044 /* the order in vmedrv_access_modes_t in "vmedrv.h".                   */
00045 };
